item.title: 70th International Convention of Libraries Association flagged off at Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[The two-days 70th International Convention of Libraries Association was flagged off at the campus of University of Agriculture Science in Raichur on Thursday.
Vice-Chancellor of Karnataka Central University, Kalaburagi, Battu Satyanarayana, who inaugurated the programme, said libraries play a key role in changing and shaping the careers of students and readers. â€œNo educational institution will teach students without a library. History reveals that universities like Takshashila and Nalanda had s...]]>
